name: rotoscope collection #1 / HOOD
description: for my fifteenth birthday, i asked for a handycam. i'd have never guessed how that would end: a video library overflowing all of my memory cards. i didn't know how many minutes of my life i had on film, let alone what to do with them... so i started to draw by hand over some of the .mp4 files. this rotoscope collection is built on my first teenage memories, scribbled all over so they don't get forgotten inside those memory cards.
